thig6.6:0.3: Verses of the Elder Mahāpajāpati Gotamī
thig6.6:1.3: who released me and many others
thig6.6:2.2: craving, its cause, has been made to wither,
thig6.6:2.3: the Eightfold Path has been developed,
thig6.6:3.1: In the past I was a mother, a child, a father, a brother,
thig6.6:3.4: I returned again and again, never finding in the darkness what I sought.
thig6.6:4.2: indeed, this is my last body.
thig6.6:4.4: now there is no coming back to any state of being.
thig6.6:5.1: See the disciples on the path—
thig6.6:5.4: this is paying homage to the Buddhas!
thig6.6:6.1: Indeed, for the benefit of many beings,
thig6.6:6.4: and the mass of suffering are vanquished.”
